SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Sponsorship Revenue Ratio ?
SRP.A: The next dimension clockwise from Sponsorship Revenue Ratio  is Ticket Sales Rate

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the counterclockwise direction from Sponsorship Revenue Ratio ?
SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Sponsorship Revenue Ratio  is Live Comment Engagement Rate .

SRP.Q: On the Ticket Sales Rate , is the point for embrace end-to-end users inside or outside the point for enable intuitive deliverables?
SRP.A: On the Ticket Sales Rate , the point for embrace end-to-end users is inside the point for enable intuitive deliverables.

VPR.Q: Which label encloses the largest score in the radar chart?
VPR.A: label {Live Comment Engagement Rate } encloses the largest score

VPR.Q: What are the strongest and weakest dimension of exploit B2C functionalities?
VPR.A: The strongest aspect is {Live Comment Engagement Rate }, while the weakest aspect is{ Stadium Occupancy Rate }.

VPR.Q: On dimension Live Comment Engagement Rate , which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Live Comment Engagement Rate , label {embrace end-to-end users} scores the highest.

VPR.Q: On dimension Stadium Occupancy Rate , which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Stadium Occupancy Rate , label {exploit B2C functionalities} scores the lowest.

NC.Q: For enable intuitive deliverables, which dimension has a higher score: Live Comment Engagement Rate  or Ticket Sales Rate ?
NC.A: {Ticket Sales Rate } has a higher score than Live Comment Engagement Rate  for enable intuitive deliverables.

NC.Q: On Live Comment Engagement Rate , which label has a higher score: embrace end-to-end users or the enable intuitive deliverables?

NC.Q: On Ticket Sales Rate , which label has a higher score: embrace end-to-end users or the enable intuitive deliverables?

NC.Q: For exploit B2C functionalities, which dimension has a higher score: Sponsorship Revenue Ratio  or Ticket Sales Rate  or Live Comment Engagement Rate ?

MSR.Q: For exploit B2C functionalities, based on the data shown in the radar chart, which dimension does it most need to improve?
MSR.A: exploit B2C functionalities most needs to improve its {Stadium Occupancy Rate }.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the strongest overall capability across all labels?

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the weaknest overall capability across all labels?
